title: Host a wedding
beginning: If the left 2 timeline schemes are the same color, earn the higher power
end: Earn the highest green power in play

title: Privilege
beginning: Earn 1
end: Draw 1

title: Inherit a title
beginning: Take 5 Privilege from the bank into your hand
end: Put 5 Privilege from the bank face down on your deck

title: Fight for freedom
beginning: Appoint 1 Privilege from the bank to the court
end: Draw until you have 6 schemes in hand

title: Serve as Sheriff
beginning: Revive the highest time in play
end: Put 1 Privilege from the bank face up on your discard

title: Found a secret order
beginning: Revive your top discard scheme's time
end: Draw the most powerful dungeon scheme's time

title: Dub a Dame in shining armor
beginning: If your top discard scheme is red, draw its time
end: Otherwise, threaten it

title: Buccaneer a treasure ship
beginning: Threaten the least powerful yellow scheme in play
end: Threaten the most powerful green dungeon scheme

title: Challenge to a duel
beginning: If the left timeline scheme is red, earn twice its power
end: Otherwise, threaten it

title: Spread the rebellion
beginning: Threaten the most powerful yellow scheme in play
end: Threaten the most powerful green scheme in play

title: Storm the palace
beginning: Threaten the rightmost yellow timeline scheme
end: Threaten the least powerful green dungeon scheme

title: Declare martial law
beginning: If you have 5 or less schemes in hand, threaten the leftmost green timeline scheme
end: Otherwise, threaten the leftmost yellow timeline scheme

title: Evict the tenants
beginning: If your top discard scheme has 20 or less power, earn twice as much
end: If you took gold, appoint the scheme to the court

title: Give fealty
beginning: Pay the lowest power in play
end: Earn the right timeline scheme's power

title: Blackmail her Majesty
beginning: If your top discard scheme is yellow, earn its power
end: Earn the highest yellow power in play

title: Smuggle contraband
beginning: Earn your top discard scheme's power
end: Put it face down on your deck

title: Reclaim your rights
beginning: If there is a more powerful scheme in play, earn its power
end: Earn the lowest yellow power in play

title: Choose the next Pope
beginning: Pay your top discard scheme's power
end: Earn 30

title: Collect alms
beginning: If your deck or discard is empty, earn 30
end: Put 1 scheme from your hand face down on your deck

title: Marry the Duchess
beginning: Pay five times the left timeline scheme's time
end: Earn twice its power

title: Learn ancient alchemy
beginning: Earn twice your top discard scheme's power
end: If it is not yellow, appoint it to the court

title: Become a Saint
beginning: If you have 5 or less schemes in hand, revive 5
end: If your discard is empty, draw 5

title: Enclose peasant land
beginning: Pay 1
end: Draw your entire deck

title: Defeat the church
beginning: Revive until your top discard scheme is not green
end: If your top discard scheme has 20 or less power, draw 5

title: Rule alongside your mother
beginning: If your top discard scheme is green, revive 5
end: If your discard is not empty, draw 5

title: Declare independence
beginning: If your top discard scheme is green, draw 5
end: Otherwise, revive 5
